title: Jinx and Vi are in the same place in their Splash Arts
body:
I discovered that they are both standing in the same region, it's just that Jinx's version has the place more damaged than Vi's


http://i.imgur.com/bFhXM6u.jpg

replies.body: This has been known for quite a bit, but congrats for noticing. Better late than never XD
Holy shit, I just found out that the earth isn't flat!
Holy shit, I just found out I can save 15% or more by switching to Geico!
HUEHUEHUEHUE but jinx is HUEHUEHUEHUE original joke

Needs more slowpokes.

LOL even the "did you know" thing Riot gave on the center of loading screen clearly mentioned about this.

I instantly noticed this once Jinx's splash is released
Never saw this

Yeah the chances that this message is displayed is lower than other messages

usually its "players who verbally abused their team mates.." or "players who are punished are reformed and..."

On the other hand...
http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/b/bc/Malphite_OriginalSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20140403002219
http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/d/d8/Cho'Gath_OriginalSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141003112741
Actually, this information sometimes pops up as loading screen trivia.
Wait...what? World War II ended?
yes and Cait is inside that room with the round window ~_~
it even said that in the loading screen sometime as the fun fact

then how about this, in the officer vi splash art what not alot of people seem to notice that jinx is sitting in the large donut behind them eating one of caitlyn's donut's.

https://gyazo.com/60e935c511cd944497c8b2b967889cc9
Would be cool to get some more lore from Piltover as we don't really know that much besides base champion backgrounds.
follow necrit in youtube
They're both also from Zaun
I thought everyone knew this already?

Yep! Its supposed to be the "before" and "after" of Piltover, after Jinx has wrecked it. Vi is there in it's glory protecting it, adn Jinx is there after its destruction admiring what she's done! Good catch ^^
News at 11
it's okay OP, I didn't know this until now xD
